domains.privacy_defaults_description: Set default privacy options for secrets created under this domain. These settings will be pre-filled when creating new secrets.
domains.default_ttl_hint: How long secrets should remain accessible by default
domains.passphrase_required_hint: Make passphrase mandatory for all secrets in this domain
domains.notify_enabled_hint: Enable email notifications by default when secrets are viewed
domains.control_whether_users_can_create_secret_: Whakahaere mehemea ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te waihanga i ngā hononga karere huna mai i te whārangi matua o tō rohe

domains.a_cname_record_is_not_allowed_instead_yo: ), kāore e whakaaetia tētahi tuhinga CNAME. Engari, me waihanga koe i tētahi tuhinga A. Ka whakaratohia ngā taipitopito mo te pēhea te mahi i tēnei ki raro iho o te whārangi.
domains.and_remove_any_other_a_aaaa_or_cname_rec: ā, tangohia ētahi atu tuhinga A, AAAA, CNAME rānei mō taua wāhitau tonu.

domains.it_may_take_a_few_minutes_for_your_ssl_c: Ka pau pea ētahi meneti mō tō tiwhikete SSL kia whai pānga.
domains.dns_changes_can_take_as_little_as_60_sec: Ka taea e ngā whakarerekētanga DNS kia iti ake i te 60 hēkona -- tae atu rānei ki te 24 haora -- kia whai pānga.

domains.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_this_dom: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te tango i tēnei rohe? Kāore e taea te whakakore tēnei mahi.
